chapter.title: The Software Repository
chapter.para:
The opencadc software is available on a github repository:
https://github.com/opencadc
The opencadc github repository contains a set of software components and libraries:
ac : client and server implementations for user and group management
apps : client applications
tap : client and server implementation of Table Access Protocol (TAP) specification
sia : client and server implementations of Simple Image Access (SIA) specification
core : core libraries used by modules in other OpenCADC repositories
vos : client and server implementations of VOSpace specification
uws : client and server implementations of the Universal Worker Service (UWS) specification
cdp : client and server implementation of Credential Delegation Protocol (CDP) specification
dal : common libraries for IVOA Data Access Layer (DAL) services
reg : client and server implementation of IVOA Registry specifications
web : client components for the web (html5 and javascript)
wcs : Java + JNI wrapper for wcslib
A copy of the each component can be obtained by:
git clone https://github.com/opencadc/<component_name>
or downloaded as .zip file by the github web interface

section.title: Download and build Access Control module from github
section.para:
It is suggested to create a work directory and moving on it, i.e.
mkdir opencadc cd opencadc
A copy of each opencadc software module can be downloaded from github issuing:
git clone https://github.com/opencadc/<module_name>

By example, the AccessControl module can be obtained issuing:
git clone https://github.com/opencadc/ac
The internal dependencies needed to build each software component can be extratcted by <component_name>/<sub_module>/build.xml file.
